title: Blended Learning Strategies for Occupational Therapy Digital Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Flexible Scheduling and Smartphone-Based Accessibility for Workforce Learners

learning_goals: Enhance occupational therapy professional reasoning skills by integrating the flipped learning model and gamification.
In a blended learning environment, acquire procedural knowledge at an 80%+ proficiency rate using mobile microlearning content.
Conduct peer feedback and clinical case analysis through digital learning tools (quiz apps, discussion forums).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
